participant_1.background:
I worked at a call center before I got my job at the factory.
I wake up, eat breakfast, and practice my cooking before work.
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
i have beard that is longer.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
Football is my main focus, and I need to look my best to be successful.
my boyfriend is unemployed.
i like doing art projects.

content.text: How is your day so far?
It's going well! I'm really enjoying the weather today.
I'm glad to hear that! I was just getting ready for work. I work at a factory.
Oh, that sounds like an interesting job. I used to work at a call center, but I got tired of it.
I can understand that. I work long hours, but it pays well.
That's good! I'm a student right now, but I'm looking for a job.
I'm studying art, but I'm not sure what I want to do with it yet.
I'm sure you'll figure it out! I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I love playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I can see why! He sounds like a great companion.
Yeah, he is. I'm glad you're having a good day!
